name: df
description: a minimal df clone for windows

scripts.publish: dotnet publish src/df/df.csproj --configuration Release --framework net6.0 --self-contained True --output Publish --runtime win-x64 --verbosity Normal /property:PublishTrimmed=True /property:PublishSingleFile=True /property:IncludeNativeLibrariesForSelfExtract=True /property:DebugType=None /property:DebugSymbols=False /property:EnableCompressionInSingleFile=True
